amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 117-507 to direct the National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health to establish an occupational research program on mental health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
